header.h1: 4-12 Online Public School in New Mexico

div.p: New Mexico Connections Academy is more than a fully accredited online school. It's a tight-knit school community offering all the services and resources needed to create a well-rounded student experience.

Ready to go? Start your online
registration now!

hr.h3: Important information about COVID-19 for enrolled families:

br.p:
Information is changing rapidly. We are in touch with state education officials. Enrolled families please check
your Webmail for messages from the School Leader for the most current information.

Students throughout New Mexico are thriving at New Mexico Connections Academy (NMCA), a tuition-free online public school. NMCA gives students the flexibility to learn at home with a curriculum that meets rigorous state education standards.

ul.li: NMCA is accredited by the North Central Association Commission Accreditation and School Improvement (NCA CASI), an accrediting division of Cognia, formerly AdvancED.
(NMCA) is a free online public virtual school serving students in grades 4–12 throughout the State of New Mexico. Additional grades may be approved after the first year.
